sentence.Network_en: We unwisely chose not to go on a coach excursion to Trondheim.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们作出了不明智的选择，没有乘旅游大巴去特隆赫姆。

sentence.Network_en: Oscar II of Sweden - Norway is crowned king of Norway in Trondheim.
sentence.Network_cn: 1873年的今天,奥斯卡二世在特隆赫姆加冕为瑞典 - 挪威的国王.

sentence.Network_en: Carl III of Sweden - Norway is crowned king of Norway, in Trondheim.
sentence.Network_cn: 1818年的今天,瑞典 - 挪威联盟的卡尔三世在挪威的特隆赫姆加冕为挪威国国王.
